member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT
member.summary: Which resources are supported for a given format and given device (see ).

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_SHADER_LOAD
member.summary: The intrinsic HLSL function load is supported.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_SHADER_SAMPLE
member.summary: The intrinsic HLSL functions Sample supported.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_SHADER_SAMPLE_COMPARISON
member.summary: The intrinsic HLSL functions SampleCmpand SampleCmpLevelZero are supported.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_MIP_AUTOGEN
member.summary: Automatic generation of mipmaps is supported.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_DISPLAY
member.summary: Format can be displayed on screen.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_CAST_WITHIN_BIT_LAYOUT
member.summary: Format cannot be cast to another format.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_MULTISAMPLE_RENDERTARGET
member.summary: Format can be used as a multisampled rendertarget.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_MULTISAMPLE_LOAD
member.summary: Format can be used as a multisampled texture and read into a shader with the load function.

member.name: D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT.D3D10_FORMAT_SUPPORT_SHADER_GATHER
member.summary: Format can be used with the gather function. This value is available in DirectX 10.1 or higher.
